review_text:
This course was a wonderful explanation of how to create a successful podcast. It not only has a thorough discussion of how to make a podcast, including everything from the gear you use and the process of editing podcasts, but also gets into the all-important work of explaining what to do with that podcast once you have it.

Thanks for creating such a great course Sam!
J'ai bien aim√© le cours, c'√©tait simple, efficace et √† l'√©chelle du d√©butant. Cela diff√©rencie Sam des autres. On se sent √† l'aise pour avancer.
A really good-looking, hot hostess, great smile, personality.  Super content, very informative.  Multiple misspelled words in the quizzes, which is why I rate it at 4 stars instead of 5.
Fantastic course with truly helpful tips and insight. Engaging and dynamic delivery too!
A great course, the information was easy to understand and not overwhelming. I liked the step by step approach as it mimic the process you need to go through the launch your first podcast.  Thanks!
Great content. Demystified the podcast creation process. Plenty to think about, but I am closer to launch thanks to this course.
Very informative, nice to listen to. Info presented in a clear understandable way.
Excellent course. I couldn't find the things you said were listed below, though. Overall, you gave a lot of information and I'm excited about starting the process.
Great course, well delivered and simple information. Only downside was the lack of links or downloads as promised in some lessons.
Really informative! Now I have the tools to launch my podcast. Can't wait!

I'm really happy to take this course,  getting to know more about Podcasting and since i finished this course i'm feeling different and getting ready to work on my Podcast project, thanks again for this course.

Sam made me feel incredibly excited and motivated to launch my podcast. This course simplifies the process of producing your first episode and having a clear plan for marketing it. I especially loved her pro tips!
Informative, easy to understand, fun.

Sam takes you through everything you need to know in a thorough way that's easy to understand. I like that she included mini quizzes for the user to test their knowledge, it's a great way to highlight key information again. Highly recommend.

This course saved me SOOO much time. She's done all of the research and gone through it , so I don't need to waste my time researching about all of the aspects involved in the launch of my podcast. (and all of the aspects I wouldn't think to research!) I'm pumped.

For a newbie and someone thinking about getting into Podcasting, this course is very informative and open my eyes to what's is expected and needs to be down.  The content was awesome and enlightening.  Not boring at all! :)  I will keep in touch and when I go live, I'll let Sam now!  Thanks a millions.  SnapAwesome course!

Sam is an amazing host for this course. I was feeling overwhelmed about the tech and logistics to starting a podcast, even though I bought a mic a while ago. This course was extremely valuable for the amount of content that's in the course- from start to finish, stats, tech, editing, etc- this is all included. Highly recommend!

This course is amazing!!! I'm in the process of starting my first podcast and this was exactly what I needed. Sam knows what she's talking about and explains things in a clear and straightforward way so it doesn't feel overwhelming. It covers structure, tech, and marketing ‚Äì everything you need to start a podcast on a budget! Thanks, Sam!
I think the content of this podcast was great, really useful and inspiring, the only thing that let it down was the errors in the subtitling. Other than that - great!
I think this course provides a detailed overview of what it takes to develop a podcast.  I'm happy with the content that was provided by Sam!

It is an overall view on how to start a podcast with some useful tips indeed. Not included are real life recordings being done or edited in in depth. Also I miss the example of uploading a episode to a host. So bottom line, it is worth what you pay but still misses some vital lessons in my opinion.
Worth every cent! Many good thoughts, and I would actually like to give a "follow-up review" so one could see if I managed it well üòâ
Great Course. Love it. üëç

So far I like what 
I'm hearing and I'm really glad I came across the email.
so far so good!  Love the enthusiasm!
This course was awesome and exactly what I was looking for!  Sam did a great job breaking all the steps down into easy to understand terms.  I feel like I can get my podcast going now. Thank you!

I simply enjoyed this course and Sam is an exquisite person. 
You'll realize there are many steps to take other than recording and publishing
and her expert insight really helps!

Excellent content presented in a highly sophisticated and professional manner. However, my beef so far is frustration at not being able to follow through on the tips and hacks because I lack the knowledge and technical expertise. For example, the presenter recommends creating "smart links." Yes I am aware of smart links, but how do you create smart links? Fortunately I know a bit more about wix, the website creator. But I hadn't had foreknowledge of wix, I would be similarly frustrated.  I guess this course is really the fundamentals for beginners. On the other hand, for advanced techie and media types, it is probably a sort of dream come through though I suspect that is not the majority who are taking this course.
The course was great and really informative
Love the energy and easy to understand.
Learned a lot, and it was an amazing experience with her.
It's a great course to learn about how to start and keep growing with a podcast üôÇ enjoying a lot still haven't finished the best whole so hope to rate again üò∏
Loved it, very complete, a lot of enthusiasm and useful links all over the course. Sam also thought out the structure very well. Would recommend!
Great content at an affordable price. Yay!!!
it was okay, nothing too special.
Very informative and rich! I highly recommend it!
Amazing course, I learned alot
This information was clear concise and professionally communicated!!!!! I look forward to launching my podcast thanks to Sam!!! Thank you!!!!!
Very informative!!  I have been tossing around the idea of starting a podcast and didn't know where to start.  This class gave me the direction I was looking for.  Thank you!!

Wow! I'm so impressed with this course. It's truly value-for-money: every single video is packed with need-to-know information and helpful tips. I knew nothing about podcast equipment and software before this course, and now I feel confident enough to get started. Thank you, Sam!
Great course! I got so much useful information about starting my podcast from equipment to buy, software, editing, marketing and more! Highly recommended!
Super helpful! A lot of information that I wouldn‚Äôt have thought about before taking this course!

I really enjoyed this course! I will be starting my own podcast soon, and this course was a great tool that answered the thousands of questions I had piling up about the process of podcasting and how to go about getting started. Sam did a great job organizing the course and is a wonderful teacher. Each section is explained thoroughly enough that once it was time to move on to the next topic, I could confidently do so without having unanswered questions from the previous topic. The best part of the course was how infectious her positive energy was. She talks in a way that helps you feel more confident about yourself and makes you excited to get started!

This was an awesome course! She was authentic and full of energy. The course was thorough, easy to follow and included action steps that can be used immediately. I'm looking forward to relaunching my blog and implementing these tools!
Super solid introductory course. I'm glad to have this resource in my library!
I loved this course! It was just the perfect balance of informational content and personal experiences. Sam was a great instructor and I now listen to her Podcast! Buy this course!
Well Done!!!!  I was on the fence on whether I could do this or not, but thanks to Sam and a particular Little Red Engine..."I think I can!!!"  and so "I Will", stay tuned.

I really enjoy how the course is layered out. How thorough and straight to the point the instructor goes for.
I have been wanting to get into it for many years. Have started and created a couple of episodes but did not find the time and the consistency to commit to it.
Maybe I wasn't confident enough. I don't know. But now, my friend now is the time. Thank you for sharing this course, it is the kick-off I needed to go full throttle on it. Thank you.
Great, practical, helpful information.
Excellent simple breakdown of a complex area for newbies - thanks

Sam has given some good tips and ideas for my own podcast, regarding structure and monetization. 

However, the titel of the course misleads a bit. It says 'Launch, Market And Monetize A Podcast', but when you go through Sam here course it says 'Starting A Podcast On A Budget'. These things are not the same. 

I also found that this course is really North America based. As a user in Europe and producing a podcast in a different language, a great part of this course becomes irrelevant.
Great course! I find it to be practical and easy to follow. Thanks!

It seems like the presenter put a lot of effort into this course. I am sure I will be referring back to it when I get my own podcast up and rolling! Thank you for taking the time to walk me through the process!

Good content and well presented. The style of the quiz questions was a bit weird, so that even though I knew the answers, I would get some wrong, but good work, Sam. Also, I think a more detailed review of the tech setup would be helpful.

REALLY Great course if you're thinking about starting a Podcast, which I have been for quite  sometime. My main concern was infrastructure (hosting resources for the budget conscious as well as how to monetize) and all of this was addressed. Thank you SO much for this course.
This was one of the most helpful courses that helped me and my team get our podcast ready to go. I want to thank you for putting this amazing platform together.
This course was a gem! I felt it gave financial options of how to get started for all levels; free, tight budget, and those with some extra cash floating around. Amazing. Thank you!
well this course was fun to hear and watch . Hear what go on in making a podcast and all the steps was a interesting enjoying to learn and i enjoyed the course.

Hi,
Sam your excitement about what you are teaching is engaging.  I wasn't sure how I was going to get this done but now I feel like this course will open up so many doors.
Thank You.
Great content, clear on each point, fun to watch. Thank you!
Amazing course! It truly got over my expectations and they were already high. Thank you very much for providing all your tools and knowledge for starting in the podcasting world.

Sam does an excellent job of breaking things down into simple, achievable steps for anyone who has had the passion or idea swirling around in their mind. This course might just be the last push that potentially GREAT Podcasters need to finally get started today.

Thanks for putting this course together.  You shared the essential "have to know" information without getting bogged down on the details or technology too much.  Would have liked to see some of the sites you refer to though throughout to see how easy it is to use (i.e.; Smart Links...how do I create one?).
Nice! Well laid out. Great information! So much angst relieved about what do it, how to do it just by watching. It appears like it was made in 2019, but I'd say still very relevant.

dECENT CONTENT. SHE OFTEN SPEAKS OF LINKS OF PLACES SHE SUGGESTS SIN THE CLASS. hOWEVER, THEY ARE EITHER NOT "BELOW" THE VIDEO AS SHE STATES OR IF THERE IS ALONK THEY ARE NOT WHAT SHE SAID THEY WOULD BE AND WORSE YET THE LINKS ARE EMPTY OR GO TO AN ERROR PAGE.  tHE CLASS SEEMED A LITTLE OUT OF DATE.  bY ABOUT 2 YEARS.
I loved this course. There is a ton of great information here. However, the answers in the quizzes were a bit unclear. But the course itself was great. Thanks!

This course was wonderfully informative about numerous aspects of podcasting. I had only a minor knowledge in all the background work involved with podcasting, however, after taking this course, I feel more confident in my knowledge over podcast production. The videos cover relavent topics, and the host provides a wealth of resources attached to each video. A course that's worth the money spent!
Thoroughly enjoyed, fun and informative.
It was so insightful and helpful!
Really great, easy to follow with each section in bite size chunks. I'm familiar with audio production but really seeing the podcast process from front to back was extremely helpful!
Great so far. This is such a great step by step intro. Wonderful job with the breakdown!

Really good course with loads of insight. The content and strategies were fab. 5 stars for that.

I think it could be updated. 

Some of the links don't work, the subtitles aren't 100% accurate and probably most importantly some things talked about either don't exist any more or the features have changed within that certain platform.
Thank you for putting this together
Very professionally presented, relevant content covering everything from A-Z. Whilst I knew lots of the bits, this course taught me lots more and put it all into context in a logical sequence. Tks!

I would consider this presentation an overview of podcasting, not necessarily a course. It does provide a direction and many helpful tips. I would say if this program were very inexpensive it would definitely be worth picking up. I don‚Äôt feel the participant will possess the skills needed to podcast after the end, but they would have a direction to go. To be an effective course, a lot more detail and demonstration would be needed. Nevertheless if the course could be obtained for five or ten dollars it would save a lot of research time about what it takes to start a podcast.
Very helpful!!!
This course was concise and packed with valuable information for anyone who is looking to produce and market podcasts. I would love to take a new and updated course for 2022. Thank you Fiverr.
Simple, valuable, and great tips for integration and growth.
Covers all the basics, after you finish this I would recommend School of Podcasting also
This course is very informative but outdated. This was recorded in 2018. I wish that was advertised before I made the purchase. Great infomation just 4 years to late.
Very relevant and valuable. Well produced.
Awesome course‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs really motivated me to launch my podcast with confidence.
Great information! I found exactly what I needed to know to start my own podcast! Can't wait to get started!
So far, love her energy and how she already makes me feel that creating a podcast is doable and not overwhelming. I'm read to learn more!
Superbly presented. Worth every penny!
Excellent course; I learned a lot.
This was  alovely course.
Very informative. Useful info.
Information is relevant but a little predictable. Too many jump cuts. Would be better if she could get through an entire segment on one take or maybe cover cuts with a full screen graphic.

Personally, I thought this program was really good.  Having no real knowledge of the actual working of podcasts, after watching the entire program I feel that it was well worth the time and effort.  The host was very knowledgeable and engaging.
Really great and helpful. Love it
It was very informative and felt that the course didn't drag on forever. Thank you!

I like it a lot so far. She's covering things that I wouldn't have considered (formats, considering your 'avatar'). I like her personality. She's relatable. I also like that it's not perfect. Not every blip is removed. It's appealing to me that she is striving for this freedom rather than that she's all 'This is how I made my millions.' And yet, she has some experience in actually doing it.

Overall, I highly recommend this course to anyone looking to start a podcast or take their existing podcast to the next level. She is a true expert in the field and her passion for podcasting is contagious. I give this course a 5-star rating
Wow a really broad spectrum course with a wealth of content ready to make you a pro podcaster
After taking this course, I feel like creating a podcast of my own is completely doable and not so scary anymore. Thank you for helping me to realize that.
Great tips, I like it very much.
